00017 XItemNodeBase::XItemNodeBase(const char *name, bool runtime, bool auto_set_any) : 
00018     XValueNodeBase(name, runtime)
00019 {
00020     if(auto_set_any) {
00021         m_lsnTryAutoSet = onListChanged().connectWeak(
00022             shared_from_this(), 
00023             &XItemNodeBase::onTryAutoSet);
00024     }
00025 }
00026 void
00027 XItemNodeBase::onTryAutoSet(const shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase>&) {
00028     if(!autoSetAny()) return;
00029     XString var = to_str();
00030     if(var.length()) return;
00031     shared_ptr<const std::deque<Item> > items = itemStrings();
00032     if(items->size()) {
00033         str(items->front().name);
00034     }
00035 }
00036 
00037 void
00038 _xpointeritemnode_throwConversionError() {
00039     throw XKameError(i18n("No item."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00040 }
00041 
00042 XComboNode::XComboNode(const char *name, bool runtime, bool auto_set_any)
00043     : XItemNodeBase(name, runtime, auto_set_any),
00044       m_strings(new std::deque<XString>()),
00045       m_var(new std::pair<XString, int>("", -1)) {
00046 }
00047 
00048 void
00049 XComboNode::_str(const XString &var) throw (XKameError &)
00050 {
00051     shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> ptr = 
00052         dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this());
00053     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_write_mutex);
00054     m_tlkBeforeValueChanged.talk(ptr);
00055     if(var.length()) {
00056         atomic_shared_ptr<const std::deque<XString> > strings(m_strings);
00057         unsigned int i = 0;
00058         for(std::deque<XString>::const_iterator it = strings->begin(); it != strings->end(); it++) {
00059             if(*it == var) {
00060                 m_var.reset(new std::pair<XString, int>(var, i));
00061                 m_tlkOnValueChanged.talk(ptr);
00062                 return;
00063             }
00064             i++;
00065         }
00066     }
00067     m_var.reset(new std::pair<XString, int>(var, -1));
00068     m_tlkOnValueChanged.talk(ptr);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void
00072 XComboNode::value(const XString &s)
00073 {
00074     try {
00075         str(s);
00076     }
00077     catch (XKameError &e) {
00078         e.print();
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 XComboNode::operator int() const {
00083     return m_var->second;
00084 }
00085 XString
00086 XComboNode::to_str() const {
00087     return m_var->first;
00088 }
00089 
00090 void
00091 XComboNode::add(const XString &str)
00092 {
00093     for(;;) {
00094         atomic_shared_ptr<std::deque<XString> > old_strings(m_strings);
00095         atomic_shared_ptr<std::deque<XString> > new_strings(new std::deque<XString>(*old_strings));
00096         new_strings->push_back(str);
00097         if(new_strings.compareAndSwap(old_strings, m_strings))
00098             break;
00099     }
00100     onListChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XItemNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00101     XString var = to_str();
00102     if(var == str) {
00103         value(str);
00104         onListChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XItemNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void
00109 XComboNode::clear()
00110 {
00111     m_strings.reset(new std::deque<XString>());
00112     onListChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XItemNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00113     value(to_str());
00114 }
00115 
00116 shared_ptr<const std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item> >
00117 XComboNode::itemStrings() const
00118 {
00119     shared_ptr<std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item> > items(new std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item>());
00120     atomic_shared_ptr<const std::deque<XString> > strings(m_strings);
00121     for(std::deque<XString>::const_iterator it = strings->begin(); it != strings->end(); it++) {
00122         XItemNodeBase::Item item;
00123         item.name = *it;
00124         item.label = *it;
00125         items->push_back(item);
00126     }
00127     if(*this < 0) {
00128         XItemNodeBase::Item item;
00129         item.name = to_str();
00130         if(item.name.length()) {
00131             item.label = formatString("(%s)", item.name.c_str());
00132             items->push_back(item);
00133         }
00134     }
00135     return items;
00136 }
00137 
00138 void
00139 XComboNode::value(int t) {
00140     shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> ptr = 
00141         dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this());
00142     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_write_mutex);
00143     m_tlkBeforeValueChanged.talk(ptr);
00144     atomic_shared_ptr<const std::deque<XString> > strings(m_strings);
00145     if((t >= 0) && (t < (int)strings->size()))
00146         m_var.reset(new std::pair<XString, int>(strings->at(t), t));
00147     else
00148         m_var.reset(new std::pair<XString, int>("", -1));
00149     m_tlkOnValueChanged.talk(ptr);
00150 }
